item.title: Trump calls for Republicans to vote to release Epstein files
item.description: House vote on a bill to compel the release of the Epstein could be a rare example of Republican lawmakers openly breaking with President Donald Trump.

item.title: 25 girls have been abducted from a secondary school in Nigeria, police say
item.description: Police in Nigeria say gunmen have abducted 25 girls from a high school in the country's northwestern Kebbi state

item.title: Suspect sought as New York Jets player Kris Boyd in critical condition after shooting
item.description: New York Jets player Kris Boyd is in critical but stable condition after being shot early Sunday morning.

item.title: WATCH: Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
item.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.

item.title: WATCH: At least 6 killed and dozens injured in Russian attacks on Kyiv
item.description: Kyiv endured an intense Russian attack early Friday morning, which killed at least six people and injured dozens more, including a pregnant woman, acc...
